com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.dialogs.progress

Interface ProgressPresenter.ProgressView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CancableView, DefaultView, HasDialogCloseButton
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProgressDialog, ProgressDialog
    Enclosing class:
    ProgressPresenter

    public static interface ProgressPresenter.ProgressView
extends DefaultView, CancableView, HasDialogCloseButton
    The {link ProgressView} is used by ProgressPresenter to present progress of a RunnableWithProgress.
